about_the_game:
Want to unravel all of the slum's secrets? This book is for you...

A Seraphim's Guide To The Slum will act as a companion book to your journey in the game Seraphim Slum. This book contains a detailed walkthrough to the four endings of Seraphim Slum and bonus content exclusive to this book: a comprehensive director's commentary from rosesrot about the thesis and themes of Seraphim Slum, a character and story breakdown, the process of creating Seraphim Slum, and more!

After purchase, you may access the DLC via:

Gear icon in Seraphim Slum's Library page
1. Go to your Library in the Steam client
2. Select Seraphim Slum and on Seraphim Slum's Library page select the gear icon
3. Select Properties... from the menu that appears
4. Select Installed Files and press "Browse..."
5. The game's folder will appear with A Seraphim's Guide To The Slum within it.
